snippet: Lloyd C. Blankfein, the chief executive of Goldman Sachs, was identified as the buyer of a seven-bedroom estate in Bridgehampton, N.Y., according to reports in The New York Post and Bloomberg News.
abstract: Lloyd C. Blankfein, the chief executive of Goldman Sachs, was identified as the buyer of a seven-bedroom estate in Bridgehampton, N.Y., according to reports in The New York Post and Bloomberg News.

headline.main: Blankfein's Bullish Bet on Hamptons Real Estate
